item.title: Ready to dye?
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Knitting day Skeins ready for dyeing! Dye solution ripples This week has been all about getting yarn ready for dyeing (and then for you lovely people to buy*!). I’ve finished knitting a jumper for myself (first one in over 12 months). The yarn I dyed today was for a commission. Now I’m going to finish […]
item.content:encoded:
Knitting day

Skeins ready for dyeing!

Dye solution ripples

This week has been all about getting yarn ready for dyeing (and then for you lovely people to buy*!). I’ve finished knitting a jumper for myself (first one in over 12 months). The yarn I dyed today was for a commission. Now I’m going to finish making up my new jumper.

*If you’re interested in the current yarn 60% Merino/40% Poly-acrylic 4-ply(suitable for socks/shawls etc.) 100g/450m in your choice of colour way, with uk p&p included for Â£10/skein. Message me if you want to claim your’s!

item.title: Field work
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Woodhead snowscape Kian in the snow Cinder in the snow Honeymoon badges So it’s been a busy few days. We went to the theatre on Friday night. In the snow. It took 5 hours to get home. 15miles. Kian pushed 18cars on the A666 (about 2 miles from home). I can happily say that my […]
item.content:encoded:
Woodhead snowscape

Kian in the snow

Cinder in the snow

Honeymoon badges

So it’s been a busy few days. We went to the theatre on Friday night. In the snow. It took 5 hours to get home. 15miles. Kian pushed 18cars on the A666 (about 2 miles from home). I can happily say that my Saxo can handle being in 6inches+ of snow. I miss the snow. I wish it hadn’t melted so quickly.

item.title: Hell is empty and all the devils are here
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Abstraction Today I saw Shakespeare 4 Kids perform The Tempest. If you get the chance, go see them. It was fantastic just to see the school groups so completely engrossed in the stage. I didn’t see any child not utterly raptured by the stage. Tomorrow will be a long day. So I had better go […]
item.content:encoded:
Abstraction

Today I saw Shakespeare 4 Kids perform The Tempest. If you get the chance, go see them. It was fantastic just to see the school groups so completely engrossed in the stage. I didn’t see any child not utterly raptured by the stage.

Tomorrow will be a long day. So I had better go sleep some of it away!

item.title: Sleepy day
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Spinning a yarn Still got snow everywhere! Another week another commission. This one I’m making with my own hand dyed yarn (cotton). Both the girls (Walnut and Cinder) have been very sleepy today, thank goodness. We’ve had a lovely gentleman from Ringtons come around and we have some new tea to try on Monday. Tomorrow […]
item.content:encoded:
Spinning a yarn

Still got snow everywhere!

Another week another commission. This one I’m making with my own hand dyed yarn (cotton). Both the girls (Walnut and Cinder) have been very sleepy today, thank goodness. We’ve had a lovely gentleman from Ringtons come around and we have some new tea to try on Monday. Tomorrow I have a shift at The Lowry – I’ll be seeing The Tempest (being performed by Shakespeare 4 kids). So I’d better get off to bed now!

item.title: Snowy times
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Kian post-training Cinder sleeping – such a rarity! Almost eggless brownies Mandeville Oversees. Well it’s snowing here in lovely Bolton. With that it does mean that I’m mostly stuck indoors (joints don’t agree with being out in the cold for longer than a few minutes). Being stuck in does have it’s downsides, like not seeing […]
item.content:encoded:
Kian post-training

Cinder sleeping – such a rarity!

Almost eggless brownies

Mandeville Oversees.

Well it’s snowing here in lovely Bolton. With that it does mean that I’m mostly stuck indoors (joints don’t agree with being out in the cold for longer than a few minutes). Being stuck in does have it’s downsides, like not seeing Mum on her birthday (Saturday). One upside is that I’ve got most of a jumper knitted this weekend (for me!). Yesterday Kian and I tried out a new-to-us restaurant with his Taste card (2for1/special discounts), Retreat, we would definitely recommend it.

item.title: It’s Showtime!
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Multi-storey car park at the Lowry. So I am home again from another shift at The Lowry. May be the last one for the week (got 2 more, but only if someone calls in sick). Today I sorted the car insurance for the year. Still over Â£1000 for both Kian and I on my little […]
item.content:encoded:
Multi-storey car park at the Lowry.

So I am home again from another shift at The Lowry. May be the last one for the week (got 2 more, but only if someone calls in sick). Today I sorted the car insurance for the year. Still over Â£1000 for both Kian and I on my little Saxo. Also been and done a food shop (hence posting this at past 2am!).

^Today’s photo feels rather reminiscent of Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks of which I am rather keen on (I’ve done a few pieces of my work based on it before, including an acrylic/pastel piece that normal resides at the top of our main stairs).

Now to bed.

item.title: Reflecting on reflections
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: BBC North (Media City) reflected on the canal. Today I got my Reddit Secret Santa presents sent off (don’t worry, it’s a rematcher gift I already sent my mail present long before Christmas!). I also had a shift at the Lowry. I delivered my latest commission too. Tomorrow I shall probably spend knitting, playing with […]
item.content:encoded:
BBC North (Media City) reflected on the canal.

Today I got my Reddit Secret Santa presents sent off (don’t worry, it’s a rematcher gift I already sent my mail present long before Christmas!). I also had a shift at the Lowry. I delivered my latest commission too. Tomorrow I shall probably spend knitting, playing with Cinder and possibly even getting my studio tidied.

item.title: First snow day of the year!
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Cinder paw print in snow Today we saw snow fall. Cinder seemed to enjoy it. She didn’t enjoy trying to go to the bathroom this morning.. Just watching the last episode of Firefly. I think this may make me cry. Damn it not being finished.
item.content:encoded:
Cinder paw print in snow

Today we saw snow fall. Cinder seemed to enjoy it. She didn’t enjoy trying to go to the bathroom this morning.. Just watching the last episode of Firefly. I think this may make me cry. Damn it not being finished.

item.title: Science and knitting weekend
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: MoSI (Manchester) Power Hall. Finished knitting project (started on Thursday) a Reddit Secret Santa rematch gift. This weekend saw me make slow cooked french toast, go to MoSI for a stargazing day (including a pop-up planetarium), shopping and even picked up some bargains! I got 2 photo albums that should have been Â£140 for just […]
item.content:encoded:
MoSI (Manchester) Power Hall.

Finished knitting project (started on Thursday) a Reddit Secret Santa rematch gift.

This weekend saw me make slow cooked french toast, go to MoSI for a stargazing day (including a pop-up planetarium), shopping and even picked up some bargains! I got 2 photo albums that should have been Â£140 for just Â£20. Need to look at sorting out our wedding photos soon.

I finished a MÃ¶bius strip scarf – only started it on Thursday. It’s for someone through Reddit Gifts Secret Santa (rematch). Send it off tomorrow with the other parts to send. Still waiting on my gift this year.

item.title: Are you the middle man?
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: Jump for my.. camera Nights come in early – Lowry lit it up. I wasn’t too well last night when we got home from club. Tomorrow is the final night of Arabian Nights (one of the Christmas shows at the Lowry). I did my final shift on it this evening. I’m going to miss it. […]
item.content:encoded:
Jump for my.. camera

Nights come in early – Lowry lit it up.

I wasn’t too well last night when we got home from club.

Tomorrow is the final night of Arabian Nights (one of the Christmas shows at the Lowry). I did my final shift on it this evening. I’m going to miss it. Next week we get back to short run productions and one-off shows.
